description: Tide`s Vanillite participated in the first few rounds of the Marine Cup Tournament. During the final of the tournament, Tide sent it to steal the Lepardas` Eye jewel from Ms Ripple room. It was able to steal it but Cilan was able to figure out that it was the one that stole the jewel as the the shape of the frozen key it used to open the case fell on the floor and left a stain.
name: Vanipeti (Tide)
